prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Division of Continuing Education, General Records, Office of the Dean, Accession #RG-16/1/6.771, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Division of Continuing Education, 1977 July 11.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of general records from the Office of the Dean, Division of Continuing Education, including correspondence and related papers on University officials, the committee on extension courses, extension expansion, future directions, and legislation.

descgrp.head: Adjunct Descriptive Data
descgrp.p: Biology Building (old "stiff hall") Continuing Education, School of- Eastern Shore Branch Continuing Education, School of- Madison Center Continuing Education, School of- Northern Virginia Center Continuing Education, School of- Roanoke Center Continuing Education, School of- Quantico Center (FBI) Continuing Education, School of- Miscellaneous
